name: Asteroids (You can't beat it)
description:
Nothing special. It took me 2 months to teach myself and make this. Should've done something better with my time...

Controls: 

  • Spacebar to thrust forward
  • arrow keys to control the direction
  • left ctrl to shoot

Note: Once the game is over (ship disappears), take a look at the digits on the top left corner, that's how long you survived (in seconds). Now hit F5 or brag about your score in comments or just cry looking the time you wasted.
